name: Crandon

topics.topic_text: Need a hand with any trouble?
topics.response_text: You want to help us out? What makes you think we want you around here, huh?

topics.topic_text: Tell me about North Vegas.
topics.response_text: We've been here for a few years, just looking for a place we can call our own.

topics.topic_text: What is there to do here?
topics.response_text: Keep your nose to the ground, stranger, that's what. Mind your own business and let us mind our own, are we clear?

topics.topic_text: What was that about salvage and traps?
topics.response_text: That's right, the H&H Tools factory on the main drag. It's been sealed for ages, and it's lousy with traps. Still, might be something valuable to you.

topics.topic_text: Tell me more about your role here.
topics.response_text: Jules, myself, and a few others patrol the streets and sewers. Any punks come up out of the rest of the city, we give 'em the run off.

topics.topic_text: What would you like me to do?
topics.response_text: Some squatters decided to take space where they don't belong, over by the playground. We'd prefer to keep 'em off the streets and out of sight.

topics.topic_text: Got any more work for me?
topics.response_text: Good work with those newcomers. I think you can handle more serious business... with more serious rewards.

topics.topic_text: Anything else you'd like me to do?
topics.response_text: You know, this time I may actually need a gun with a brain.

topics.topic_text: Who are you?
topics.response_text: Name's Crandon, stranger. I keep an eye out for trouble around here.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Can I help you with something, stranger?

topics.topic_text: I'm a friend, trust me.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Really? You'll forgive me if I ask you to back that claim up, won't you?

topics.topic_text: What kind of trouble?
topics.response_text: Folks that don't belong. Murderers, rapists, extortionists, and everything in between.

topics.topic_text: Doesn't the NCR keep order around here?
topics.response_text: NCR... did you just crawl out from under a rock? Those folks only care about{emphasize all three "theirs"}their business, their people and their pockets.

topics.topic_text: I'm not interested in this, right now.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: I'll see you around.

topics.topic_text: If you've got the caps, I'll back any claim you want.
topics.response_text: [FAILED] Hmm. Honesty's a good trait, stranger, but I don't deal with mercenaries unless I'm damn sure they can be trusted.

topics.topic_text: I'm on it.
topics.response_text: I like your speed, stranger. Let me know when that's done.

topics.topic_text: I've got other things in mind, right now.
topics.response_text: Mercs with a brain are no good to me, stranger. Let me know when you start behaving like a real gun.

topics.topic_text: I'll deal with them.
topics.response_text: Glad to hear it. Let me know when they're gone.

topics.topic_text: Okay, I'll go see her.
topics.response_text: I like your enthusiasm, stranger. Let me know when that's done.

topics.topic_text: I haven't sent them to the sewers, yet.
topics.response_text: I thought you'd be made of stronger stuff, merc. Don't prove me wrong or I'll have to find someone else with the guts to do what's right.

topics.topic_text: I've dealt with those newcomers.
topics.response_text: That's good to hear. Can't ever be too careful with strangers around here.

topics.topic_text: I'm not interested in this right now.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself.

description:
Crandon is a 45 year-old African American Male.

A community leader and watchman in North Vegas Square, Crandon maintains order and protects the settlement's residents from the dangers of the wasteland.

Crandon's Personality: Pragmatic, protective, and authoritative, Crandon takes his role as community leader seriously. He's cautious but fair, willing to make tough decisions for the good of the Square.

Crandon's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Crandon survived the apocalypse and eventually found himself in the ruins of Vegas. When Mr. House cleared out squatters from the Strip in 2274, Crandon joined others in establishing North Vegas Square as a safe haven. Taking on a leadership role, he works alongside Jules to protect their community from threats in the wasteland.
